name: Escape the Lab (itch) (MKuper)
description:
This was our game for Centennial College's Game Development Game Jam 2022. The theme was "other world," and we decided to try to make a 3D platformer, where you can phase shift between worlds to make progress and reach the end of the level. We managed to get 2 solid levels designed and built, with the third level started but in rough shape. I went back and redesigned the first 2 levels after the jam was finished.

Credits:

Vladislav Volodin - Coding

Jolanne Manalese - Level Design

Jenny Sherwood - 3d & Tech Art

Marko Kuper (Me) - Coding & Level Design

Matthew McInerney - Audio

Nathaniel Hachey - UI Design and Implementation, Level Design

Jacob Giannone - UI Art
